title: The Revenant 2015 (2160p 4K Bluray x265 10bit AAC 7.1 Joy)[UTR]
description:
The Revenant 2015 (2160p 4K Bluray x265 HEVC 10bit AAC 7.1 EN FR SP PO Joy)[UTR] (Size: 7.14 GB)

   The Revenant 2015 (2160p x265 10bit Joy).mkv 7.14 GB 


Description


A 4K x265/HEVC Player is a REQUIREMENT for this Torrent!
 If you want the OLD format that works with all the OLD kit, get the x264 version.

Seriously, if you don't have 4K set up, why are you downloading this?

 I can confirm that this torrent plays on my Vizio TV M43-C1 and my i7 PC (not on anything less!).

image

 The Revenant 2015, in 2160p aka 4K, x265 aka HEVC and 7.1 English and French, Spanish and Portuguese Stereo audio,
 and more subs than KAT can list, all for about 7.14gb!
 Encoded using the time consuming 2 pass, in 10bit color, from the UHD Blu-ray source, for the highest quality possible.
Warning: I made a boobo that I didn't catch until posting. Somehow Spanish Forced Subs got enabled by default. 
 You would need to know how to turn them off in your player. 
 If you don't understand what I am saying, please don't download
